meta.job_title: IT Voice and Collaboration Platform Manager

duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan the overall design and oversee the development of voice/collaboration platforms.
Develop the strategic IT plan to enable voice and video services delivery through consistent approaches and solutions across all lines of business.
Participate in disaster recovery infrastructure planning, building, and testing.
Define and deliver continuous improvement plans and programs so that system availability and performance is improved.
Communicate architecture decisions, roadblocks, and timelines to stakeholders.
Manage the design and approach to access, security, continuity, and maintenance of all services.
Participate in discussions with vendors and suppliers to resolve critical network issues and support the implementation of new technologies.
Serve as a technical mentor for staff through sharing knowledge and developing staff.
Defines and maintains all voice and video service’s key performance indicator (KPI) metrics.
Works collaboratively with IT leaders on strategic network services initiatives to continuously improve policy, standard, and procedures.
Analyzes market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.
Participates in disaster recovery infrastructure planning, building, and testing.
Defines and delivers continuous improvement plans and programs so that system availability and performance is improved.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a quantitative or business field (e.g., statistics, mathematics, engineering, computer science)
